div.p: The data used in this study belong to the Maine Department of Marine Resources and the National Marine Fisheries Service. These data can be requested from the Maine Department of Marine Resources' Licensing Division: http://www.maine.gov/dmr/commercial-fishing/licenses/index.html. The phone number for the Licensing Division is: +001 (207) 624-6550. Federal permit data can be obtained through the National Marine Fisheries Service Greater Atlantic Region Permit Office ( https://www.greateratlantic.fisheries.noaa.gov/aps/permits/).
